label: Fantasy
comment: Fantasy is a genre of speculative fiction involving magical elements, typically set in a fictional universe and sometimes inspired by mythology and folklore.

label: Nonfiction
comment: Nonfiction is any document or media content that attempts to provide accurate information regarding a real-world topic. It is written to communicate facts or opinions about reality.

label: Sci-Fi
comment: Science fiction (sci-fi) is a form of fiction that deals principally with the impact of actual or imagined science upon society or individuals.
